title.narrative: Shaanxi Poor Rural Areas Community Development Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to increase incomes of targeted beneficiaries in selected poor counties of Shaanxi.

International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Shaanxi Provincial Office of Poverty Alleviation and Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plans | Description :Provision requiring the submission of annual work plans by the Project Countiesto the Provincial PMO, and the onward submission of the consolidated version of said plans to the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :Provisions requiring the maintenance of Project leading groups andProject management offices at the provincial and county levels. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Operation Manual | Description :Provision requiring the Project to be carried out in accordance with theProject Operations Manual, including the arrangements for: (1) providing grants to Project Farmer Cooperatives under animplementation agreement; and (2) providing matching grants to finance enterprise investments which establish partnerships withfarmer cooperatives | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Instruments | Description :Provision requiring the Project to be carried out in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Management Framework, the Pest Management Plan, the Resettlement Policy Framework (and any ResettlementAction Plans prepared thereunder). | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
